subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology
subSections.text:
Possibly {{der|zh|sit}}; compare {{cog|bo|ཇག||robbery}} ({{zh-ref|Coblin, 1986}}). {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} points out that a palatalized consonant in {{cog|bo|-}} does not usually correspond to an unpalatalized one in Chinese; instead, he compares it to {{cog|km|ឆក់||to snatch; to steal}}.

Possibly cognate with {{och-l|災|natural disaster}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).
